normalised: Maka konnem tor poochlem, "Hanv charity-ak kitlem daan diunk zai?" Punn, tem ekdom vyaktik question zaun asa, nhoi? Maka ugddas asa hanv jehna college-antle bhair poddun kamaucheak laglem. Mhoji paghar fakt rupees panchvees hazar per month asli, ani Mumbai-nt jiyevop ekdom expensive dishtalem! Punn hanv takay porot diunk xetalem.

unnormalised: Konnen mhakka vicharlem, "Hanv kitlen dan dharma korunk zai?" Khoim, tem ekdom veyakti vigaracho prosn, nhoi mhonn? Mhaka ugddas asa hanvem poilem kamak laglem tedna, college-antlean bhair yetkoch. Mhojem pongar fokot Rs. 25,000 dor mhoineaak aslem, ani Mumbai-nt jiyevop kitlen mast distalem! Punn mhaka asli tuka favo tem divnk.
normalised: Hanv thoddem-thoddem korun suru kelem, rupees panch xem ek local N-G-O-k daan dilem je underprivileged bhurgeankam kortali. Tem chodd disona asli, punn tanchean chehrea-voir asleli khuxalkai amuly asli. Magir, Kerala-nt zallelea purallea vellar hanvem rupees don hazar C-M-chea relief fund-ak dile. T-V-er barbaad dekhun, maka ani korunk zai dista aslem. Mhoji ixtt, Aisha, ti dorekam mhoinea-k aple pagara-chea dha percent daan kortal, je maka sadanch borem distalem.

unnormalised: Hanvem thoddem korun survat keli, ek sthanik NGO-k Rs. 500 dit, zonvar naslolyachea bhurgeam vangdda kam kortali. Tem khub distana disonaa punn tanchi hansop dekhun mulyan chukovna. Uprant, Kerala-chea purant thoddea vorasam adhi, hanvem CM-chea aadhar nidhi-k Rs. 2000 dile. TV-cher tabahai dista mhunn dekhun, hanvem ani korunk zata mhunn mhaka dislem. Mhoji ixtt, Aisha, tinnem dor mhoineak aplo pongaracho 10% ditalem, zaka hanv sodanch vakhandtatalem.
normalised: Uprant, jehna mhojem income vaddot gelam, hanvem veg-veglea causes-ank daan diunk suru kelem. Hanv animal shelters-ank rupees ek hazar detim, ani magir festivals-anchea vellar jese Diwali, hanv orphanages-antle bhurgeank zaitexim mithai dakoond rupees ek hazar panch xem-chea laginch ghertalim. Hanvem ek fundraiser pan dekhlem jevnni tanne ek tornattek bhurgeak heart surgery-ak dollar panch hazar zai axelem. Tem maka kharaich laglem.

unnormalised: Uprant, mhoji kamai vaddlyauprin, hanvem veg-veglea karnank dan diunk survat keli. Hanv zonvarachea ashrayak â‚¹1000 ditolem, ani magir Diwali-chea parvank bhurgeank anath ashramant sumar Rs 1500-ache godyeo viktto gheun ditolem. Hanvem ek vell fundraiser dekhlem jem eke tornateche dolleache surgeryak $5000 zai aslem. Tem khorench mhakka laglem.
normalised: Sach sangun, tanne konn magic number nassona. Tumi kitlem comfortably diunk zata apnne financial stability-ak laagun nassona. Tum Friday night-ak movie dekhunch sodun rupees teen xem charity-ak diunk zatat? Tum mhoinea-k ek novi dress sodun rupees ek hazar charity-ak diunk zata? Dor ek lhan-lhan item muhimu asa, sachun.

unnormalised: Satyan, konnachich gajab sankhya na. Tujea arthik sthirtecher porinnam korinaastana tum kiteak sopaien diunk zata mhunn vichar. Tum Shukurvar ratchi cinema soddunk shaktai ani tachi suater Rs. 300 diunk shaktai? Tum dor mhoineaak ek novem lugtt soddunk shaktai ani Rs. 1000 diunk shaktai? Dor thoddem-thoddem dhen, khorench.
normalised: Tor, hanv tumak je bhara-i diunk zata te asa: Tumak je borem dista tem daan di. Bhalliek rupees ek xem assa va rupees dha hazar, tumchi intention muhimu asa. Ani, Section eighty G-antle tax benefits magunk visrunk naka!

unnormalised: Mhaka diunk zata tem boreantlem bore utor mhunn: Tum kiteak barem dista tem dinv. Tem Rs. 100 aso vo Rs. 10,000 aso, irado most mhotvacho. Ani Section 80G-ntle tax labh vhinnvunk visrunk naka!
